Description.Text: The Radisson Blu Edwardian Berkshire is a modern 4-star property, offering stylish accommodation in the heart of London's fashionable Oxford Street area. The hotel provides free Wi-Fi and boasts an award-winning restaurant. The hotel sits on Oxford Street, close to the junction with Bond Street. There are plenty of major department stores and fashionable boutiques on Oxford Street and in the surrounding area. Nearby places of interest include Regent Street, Piccadilly Circus and a number of flagship shops like Selfridges, House of Fraser and Niketown. Bond Street tube station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular London destinations. The hotel is housed in a historic mid-rise building on the corner of Marylebone Lane. There are no leisure facilities onsite, but free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. The award-winning Ascot restaurant and bar serves modern British cuisine using premium seasonal ingredients. The restaurant is situated in luxurious surrounding with wood-panelled walls, wooden floors and leather furniture. The air-conditioned Standard rooms feature contemporary decor. They offer a minimum of 12sqm floor space and come with a marble bathroom. Amenities include a mini-bar, tea and coffee making facilities, a TV and digital entertainment system. The hotel concierge can arrange mobile phone rentals, car hires, limousine services and theatre and sightseeing bookings.
